description:
Integrating TON SDK into a no code plugin. Build Apps on TON Blockchain without a single line of code!

#Features:
- Connect/Disconnect a Wallet such as Tonkeeper, MyTonWallet, etc.
- Provide a list of wallets that can be connected
- Option to setup a custom provider
- Get connected wallet address
- Get wallet balance
- Detect connected chain
- Get a list of all transactions
- Send tokens
- Write/Read a Smart Contract

Demo:
http://ton-nocode.bubbleapps.io/version-test/
name: TON Connect NoCode SDK
plugin_instructions:
# Installation
- Simple add the plugin element on the page
- Follow the plug app editor example of how to use it's actions and events

Simple video tutorial for Bubble beginners
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rHePsEWHcFM
